content: if to p row 12 k1 yo k1 +2 sts step no 2 finishing weave in ends block as desired sew on button step no 3 care hand wash or dry clean wash in tepid water using a mild soap do not twist shape and dry flat on a towel store folded do not hang p 03 blue sky fibers abbreviations bobble bind off p2tog purl 2 stitches together co cast on repeat repeat es elongated stitch insert rh ssk slip slip knit slip 2 needle into space between rt and stitches separately knitwise lt four row below wrap yarn insert left needle in front of 2 around needle and pull up a slipped stitches knit 2 slipped long loop stitches together k knit st s stitch es k2tog knit 2 stitches together rt right twist skip next stitch lt left twist skip next stitch and knit into second st from the and knit into second st from the front knit first stitch slip behind knit first stitch slip both sts off together both sts off together ws wrong side m1 make one insert left needle yo yarn over from front to back under strand * repeat the directions between between last stitch worked and the asterisks as many times as next stitch on left needle knit indicated this loop through the back p purl p o box 88 minneapolis mn 55011 usa blueskyfibers com ©2024 this knit pattern is copyrighted material and under the copyright laws of the united states you may use this pattern for your own personal use or enjoyment but may not edit publish copy or commercially exploit this pattern in any way 04012024 p 05
